languages.text: "Господин Ульфар, пусть мне это будет стоить жизни, но скажу прямо — Глейто лучше любого волка, и даже слова Ангела Императора не изменят моего мнения".
"Lord Ulfar, it may well cost me my life, but I'll speak plainly — Glaito is better than any wolf. Not even the words of an Angel of the Emperor can change my mind."
languages.original_text: "Господин Ульфар, пусть мне это будет стоить жизни, но скажу прямо — Глейто лучше любого волка, и даже слова Ангела Императора не изменят моего мнения".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Ulfar, it may well cost me my life, but I'll speak plainly — Glaito is better than any wolf. Not even the words of an Angel of the Emperor can change my mind."
"Lord Ulfar, it may well cost me my life, but I'll speak plainly — Glaito is better than any wolf. Not even the words of an Angel of the Emperor can change my mind."
"Lord Ulfar, it may well cost me my life, but I'll speak plainly — Glaito is better than any wolf. Not even the words of an Angel of the Emperor can change my mind."
"Lord Ulfar, it may well cost me my life, but I'll speak plainly — Glaito is better than any wolf. Not even the words of an Angel of the Emperor can change my mind."
"Lord Ulfar, it may well cost me my life, but I'll speak plainly — Glaito is better than any wolf. Not even the words of an Angel of the Emperor can change my mind."

languages.text: 「ウルファー卿、これを口にすれば命を落とすかもしれませんが、はっきり言わせていただきます。グライトは、どんな狼よりも優れています。たとえ皇帝の天使の言葉でも、私の考えは変わりません」
languages.original_text: "Lord Ulfar, it may well cost me my life, but I'll speak plainly — Glaito is better than any wolf. Not even the words of an Angel of the Emperor can change my mind."

traits.locale_text: 「ウルファー卿、これを口にすれば命を落とすかもしれませんが、はっきり言わせていただきます。グライトは、どんな狼よりも優れています。たとえ皇帝の天使の言葉でも、私の考えは変わりません」

languages.text: "Lord Ulfar, es mag mich das Leben kosten, aber ich spreche offen: Glaito ist besser als jeder Wolf. Nicht einmal die Worte eines Engels des Imperators können meine Meinung ändern."
languages.original_text: "Lord Ulfar, it may well cost me my life, but I'll speak plainly — Glaito is better than any wolf. Not even the words of an Angel of the Emperor can change my mind."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Ulfar, es mag mich das Leben kosten, aber ich spreche offen: Glaito ist besser als jeder Wolf. Nicht einmal die Worte eines Engels des Imperators können meine Meinung ändern."

languages.text: « Seigneur Ulfar, au risque d'y laisser la vie, je me dois de vous parler franchement : Glaito vaut mieux que n'importe quel loup. Rien ne me fera changer d'avis, pas même les paroles d'un ange de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Ulfar, it may well cost me my life, but I'll speak plainly — Glaito is better than any wolf. Not even the words of an Angel of the Emperor can change my mind."

traits.locale_text: « Seigneur Ulfar, au risque d'y laisser la vie, je me dois de vous parler franchement : Glaito vaut mieux que n'importe quel loup. Rien ne me fera changer d'avis, pas même les paroles d'un ange de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: «Lord Ulfar, aunque me cueste la vida, le hablaré sin tapujos: Glaito es mejor que cualquier lobo. Ni siquiera las palabras de un ángel del Emperador me harán cambiar de opinión».
languages.original_text: "Lord Ulfar, it may well cost me my life, but I'll speak plainly — Glaito is better than any wolf. Not even the words of an Angel of the Emperor can change my mind."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Ulfar, aunque me cueste la vida, le hablaré sin tapujos: Glaito es mejor que cualquier lobo. Ni siquiera las palabras de un ángel del Emperador me harán cambiar de opinión».

languages.text: “虽然这么说可能会让我付出生命的代价，乌尔法大人，但我得坦率地表达我的意见。格雷托比所有的狼都更厉害，即便是帝皇的天使，也改变不了我的看法。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Ulfar, it may well cost me my life, but I'll speak plainly — Glaito is better than any wolf. Not even the words of an Angel of the Emperor can change my mind."

traits.locale_text: “虽然这么说可能会让我付出生命的代价，乌尔法大人，但我得坦率地表达我的意见。格雷托比所有的狼都更厉害，即便是帝皇的天使，也改变不了我的看法。”

languages.text: "Sözlerim hayatıma mal olabilir Lord Ulfar ama açık konuşacağım. Glaito, hiçbir kurtla kıyaslanamaz. İmparator'un Meleği gelse fikrimi değiştiremez."
languages.original_text: "Lord Ulfar, it may well cost me my life, but I'll speak plainly — Glaito is better than any wolf. Not even the words of an Angel of the Emperor can change my mind."

traits.locale_text: "Sözlerim hayatıma mal olabilir Lord Ulfar ama açık konuşacağım. Glaito, hiçbir kurtla kıyaslanamaz. İmparator'un Meleği gelse fikrimi değiştiremez."

languages.original_text: "Lord Ulfar, it may well cost me my life, but I'll speak plainly — Glaito is better than any wolf. Not even the words of an Angel of the Emperor can change my mind."
